title: Printer System Dialogue Settings: Not using default/or last setting
content:
We altered the about:config settings print.tab_modal to false, as it was time consuming to have to keep selecting the system dialogue box, as we have two trays on one printer that we use to print (not available as a selection on Mozilla print page) and also have other printers we use, for different jobs.

The issue is when we select one of the printers (to print labels), it does not use the default settings, so we have to alter the size of the label each time we print. Mozilla used to save these settings and now it does not.

I have even tried to alter the "print.printer_name.print_paper_height" & width, but still no luck.

How do I get Mozilla to use the default printer settings, or remember the setting?
creator: richard207

title: I am having problems managing a large number of bookmarks
content:
My bookmark list is very large due to multiple imports from other browsers, syncing and not managing. There are currently well over 1200 bookmarks in my toolbar. I am trying to delete the majority of them. I have tried to backup and export before I do this, and have been unable. Firefox won't create any files. I have tried all other suggestions on the forum, stopping sync, Verifying the Integrity, renaming the places.sqlite file, and also refreshing and re-installing Firefox. Nothing works. I also find that Firefox is consistently using over 50% of CPU resources. So the program feels very sluggish. I will post the Verify integrity log below.

title: PAC Url is not working
content:
Hi,

in our Organization it happened to two User that they cannot use Firefox anymore for external Sites. We upgraded to Firefox 78.9.0 ESR on 08.04.2021 but the issue happened Today. Our internal DNS is only resolving internal Domains. I copied the Profile of one affected User to test it on one of my devices with the Same Version Firefox has a auto Proxy Configuration URL set. When i try to load the URL manually nothing happens as in screenshot2. I also verified it with Wireshark. No HTTP Request is send to the IP. In about:networking I can see that the Domain is resolved screenshot 3. When i try to use the IP it works screenshot 4 When i use the IP in the "auto Proxy Configuration URL " it also works.

When i create a new Profile the Domain Name and the URL both work.

How can I find the cause of this issue ?

Kind Regards Marco Hald
creator: marco.hald

title: Can`t add bookmarks and important pages anymore
content:
since a couple of days ago, I cannot save any bookmarks anymore. If I press the star, nothing happens. If I try adding the bookmark manually through the menu, nothing happens after I press add to bookmarks.

When I open a new page, the section "important pages" is with empty tiles. I cannot add any pages manually either. If I put in an address and save it, still no pic appears and if I press the tile, nothing happens.

I deinstalled and installed several times, with deinstaller and special programm, with and without disconnecting from my account. I tried opening the browser in safety mode but the problem stays the same. nothing seems to work. When installing again, it always automatically imports my settings, I cannot seem to be able to prevent that in order to see, if it is something there.

The problem seems to occur onlny on my computer at home, the tablet, cellphone and laptop that are also connected to my account are working fine.

Does anybody know, what to do?

I work with Windows 10 64bit and the newest version of mozilla

title: Firefox Sync popups and emails after syncing new device
content:
Hi

This is not a bug, just more of a feature request. Every time when I sync an account to a new device, I got a popup to sync another device and afterwards I get a mail on how to complete my sync setup and sync another device. I'd have no problem with it, if this is my first device that I am trying to sync. But I have several devices with the sync enabled, I am syncing from these devices and Mozilla knows this as it has history of devices where I was signed in and it can see that there are data to be synced so apparently this is not the first device you are trying to sync. Can we have an option to dismiss these messages and popups forever?

Thanks
creator: kovacikster

creator: alekfer75

title: Firefox constantly unloading tabs
content:
For about..hmm... I'm not sure how long. At least a couple months, Firefox has been acting very strange. Before christmas I did a reset on firefox to clear up some issues. I don't run very many add-ons. I use moderator toolbox for reddit, ublock origin, and a "view image" add-on to add the "view image" option back into google images.

That's it.

I've had all of those for much longer than this problem has existed.

I checked browser.tabs.unloadOnLowMemory and it's set to false.

I have 32 gb of ram and my ram is nowhere near being fully used.

What I'm seeing is that if I have 4 or 5 tabs open, going back to a reddit or youtube tab that I always have open results in that tab being unloaded and having to wait while it reloads the tab.

I also notice from time to time that middle clicking something to open a link in a new tab results in the browser jamming up from anywhere from 1-3 seconds.

Used Firefox for years and never seen any kind of issue like this before. I used to be able to easily open 20-30 tabs if I was going through google search results to try and find some information and never had any problem.
creator: crossmr
